title: argument_type
description: Description of the inputs and outputs to a function

type.description: Type of the argument. Must be one of the types recognized by DLHub.

shape.description: Shape of an input ndarray, required if type is ndarray. Any dimensions that can be arbitrary sizes may be annotated with `null`. E.g., [null, 4]

python_type.description: Name of the python type. Give the full module path (e.g., pymatgen.core.Composition)
